net.hudup.data

Class DefaultExternalQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.core.alg.AlgAbstract
      • net.hudup.core.data.ExternalQueryAbstract
        • net.hudup.data.DefaultExternalQuery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, java.util.EventListener, Alg, AlgRemote, AlgRemoteTask, SetupAlgListener, AutoCloseable, Exportable, ExternalQuery, ExternalQueryRemote, ExternalQueryRemoteTask

    public class DefaultExternalQuery
extends ExternalQueryAbstract
    This class is default implementation of ExternalQuery interface. Currently, the default implementation only maps units such as user, item, and rating.
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public boolean setup(DataConfig internalConfig,
                     ExternalConfig externalConfig)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: ExternalQueryRemoteTask
        Setting up (initializing) this external query by both internal configuration and external configuration.
        Parameters:
        internalConfig - internal configuration to describe Hudup database.
        externalConfig - external configuration to describe outside database.
        Returns:
        whether setting up successfully.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • preImportData

        protected void preImportData()

      • importData

        public void importData(ProgressListener registeredListener)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: ExternalQueryRemoteTask
        Fill in Hudup database by importing data from outside (external database) database. The Hudup database (internal database) is described by internal configuration mentioned in ExternalQueryRemoteTask.setup(DataConfig, ExternalConfig). The outside database (external database) is described by external configuration mentioned in ExternalQueryRemoteTask.setup(DataConfig, ExternalConfig).
        Parameters:
        registeredListener - the registered ProgressListener to observe the importing process. This listener can do some particular tasks such as showing the progress bar so that users know the progress of importing process.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if any error raises.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: AutoCloseable
        The main method of this interface, which is responsible for releasing resources occupied by auto-closable object. The finalize() method of auto-closable class should call AutoCloseable.close() method so that AutoCloseable.close() method is called automatically before the Java garbage collector destroys auto-closable object.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Overrides:
        close in class ExternalQueryAbstract
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if any error raises.
